title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 39.1 - Prohibition of smoking in the United Court System
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 39.1 - Prohibition of smoking in the United Court System

State Regulations

Smoking is prohibited anywhere in any
facility or other indoor area used by courts or agencies of the Unified Court

System. This includes courtrooms, offices, cafeterias, lounges, restrooms, elevators, hallways and vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
39.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
